author: shuston
msg: Revised Messages to keep track of queues each message is on to enable finding all messages on a deleted queue. Removed this type of tracking from MSSqlClfsProvider.cpp.

author: shuston
msg: When running store tests, pass the store type to the script. Also added test runs for the CLFS store.

author: rgoers
msg: Allow source to be built in the dist directory when run from main project directory

author: rajith
msg: QPID-2928 QPID-2737 The isExclusive method in BasicMessageConsumer_0_10.java takes the dest syntax into consideration when determining the exclusivity for a subscription. For destinations created using the addressing syntax, Queue subscriptions are non exclusive by default but are allowed to change it. Topic subscriptions are exclusive and is not allowed to change the value.
